@usedefaults

{{agentcontroller2job: job:$$job }}

h2. Job Details

| *Command* | ${job.cmd} |
| *Grid ID* | ${job.gid} |
| *Node* | ${job.nid} |
| *Role* | ${job.role} |
| *Fanout* | ${job.fanout} |

h3. Run Arguments
{{code:
${job.args}
}}

h3. Job Input
{{code:
${job.data}
}}

{{html
        <div class="panel-group" id="accordion" role="tablist" aria-multiselectable="true">
}}
{% for result in results %}

    h3. Job Results of ${result.gid}:[${result.nid}|/grid/grid node?id=${result.nid}&gid=${result.gid}]

    {{html:
            <div class="panel panel-default">
<div id="${result.gid}:${result.nid}" class="panel-collapse" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="heading_${result.gid}:${result.nid}">
  <div class="panel-body">}}

    h5. Result Details
        | *Start Time* | ${result.starttime}|
        | *Time* | ${result.time} |
        | *State* | ${result.state} |
        | *Result Level* | ${result.level} |
    h6. Result

{{code:
${result.data}
}}
    h6. Log Messages
        ||Level||Message||
        {% for msg in result.msgs -%}
            |${msg.level} | ${msg.data}|
        {% endfor %}
{{html
    </div></div></div>
}}

{% endfor %}
